sen.j: 三国岳トンネル（みくにだけトンネル）は、京都府舞鶴市と福井県大飯郡高浜町を貫く舞鶴若狭自動車道のトンネル。
sen.e: The Mikunidake Tunnel is one of the tunnesl of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture and Takahama-cho, Oi District, Fukui Prefecture.
The Mikunidake Tunnel is one of the tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture and Takahama-cho, Oi District, Fukui Prefecture.
sen.cmt: tunnels スペル訂正しました。
sen.e: The Mikunidake Tunnel is one of the tunnels of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, running between Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture and Takahama-cho, Oi District, Fukui Prefecture.

sen.j: 開通時より対面通行（暫定二車線通行）となっている。
sen.e: As originally designed, this tunnel houses a two-lane roads without a dividing strip. (It is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes of the road)
As originally designed, this tunnel houses a two-lane roads without a dividing strip (it is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes of the road.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。it 小文字にしました。
sen.e: As originally designed, this tunnel houses a two-lane roads without a dividing strip (it is temporary operated in two lanes out of four lanes of the road.)

sen.j: 2003年（平成15年）：舞鶴若狭自動車道の小浜延伸に伴い供給開始。
sen.e: 2003: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway was extended to Obama and opened to traffice.
2003: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway was extended to Obama and opened to traffic.
2003: The tunnel began its operation when the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway was extended to Obama and opened to traffic.

sen.j: 4車線化も計画されているが、舞鶴若狭道の早期全通を優先しており、着工の見通しは立っていない。
sen.e: The proposal of construction was made for the Expressway and the tunnel for transforming the road into four-lane; however, currently there is no sign of starting the construction because the priority is given to complete the entire Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway first.

The proposal of construction was made for the Expressway and the tunnel for transforming the road into four-lane; however, currently there is no sign of starting the construction because the priority is given to complete the entire Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway first.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: The proposal of construction was made for the Expressway and the tunnel for transforming the road into four-lane; however, currently there is no sign of starting the construction because the priority is given to complete the entire Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway first.
